Body:
"""
    Compare macro output

    macro_outputs: output as read from TPI/TPI_macro_vars.pkl using
                   macro_output.dump_diff_output
                   created in TPI.run_TPI
    macro_var_idx: index of TPI macro ouptut variable from OUTPUT_VARS
    """
assert np.allclose(macro_outputs['new']['pct_changes'][(macro_var_idx), :],
    macro_outputs['reg']['pct_changes'][(macro_var_idx), :], atol=0.001,
    rtol=0.001)
pytest.mark.regressionpytest.mark.parametrize('macro_var_idx', np.arange(len(MACRO_VARS)))
